title: Image Compressor
subtitle: Compress images quickly and privately in your browser.
paragraphs: This tool reduces image file size while keeping acceptable quality. Select one or more images and download the compressed results instantlyâ€”no upload required.
Settings are conservative by default. Adjust compression in future releases for different quality/size trade-offs.
Note: Compression happens locally in your browser. For very large images or many files, the process may take longer depending on your device.
